[[Vancouver]], [[Canada]] (Crecy Enterprises) | PlaceOfFormation = [[England]] | PlaceOfDissolution = | Creators = David Michelinie; Bob Layton; John Romita Jr. | First = Iron Man Vol 1 120 | History = ===Overview=== '''Hammer Industries''' ('''[[wikipedia:NYSE|NYSE]]:''' HMR) is an [[United Kingdom|British]] global aerospace, defense, security and advanced technologies company with worldwide interests. It is headquartered in [[London (England)|London]], [[UK]]. Hammer Industries employs thousands people with facilities all over the world. The President and CEO of Hammer Industries is billionaire industrialist [[Justin Hammer (Earth-616)|Justin Hammer]] ===Origin=== Hammer Industries was the international design and manufacturing firm founded by [[Justin Hammer (Earth-616)|Justin Hammer]], and became one of the leading weapons suppliers in the world after Stark International moved out of weapons production.{{r|Iron Man Vol 1 124}} ===Modern Era=== Once Justin Hammer died, and years later, [[Justine Hammer (Earth-616)|Justine Hammer]] (Hammer's daughter) re-established Hammer Industries into a newer multi-million dollar weapons supplier known as Detroit Steel along with her daughter, [[Sasha Hammer (Earth-616)|Sasha]].{{r|Invincible Iron Man Vol 2 25}} [[File:Hammer Industries (Earth-616) from Invincible Iron Man Vol 2 25 001.jpg|thumb|left|Justine and Sasha]] The mother-daughter combo teamed up with corrupt generals, soldiers and technology-powered super-terrorists such as the [[Spymaster]] and one [[Ezekiel Stane]] - whom Sasha was dating. It is also revealed that Sasha's father was [[Iron Man]]'s old nemesis [[The Mandarin]]. As a family, The Mandarin, The Hammers and Stane aimed to ruin and discredit Tony Stark as he established his new company Stark Resilient.{{r|Invincible Iron Man Vol 2 27|33}} Following Justine's death at the hands of Sasha in revenge for what the Mandarin had done to Ezekiel,{{r|Invincible Iron Man Vol 1 527}} the company's fate is unknown.
